General.Name: Eternal Energy Public Company Limited
General.Description: Eternal Energy Public Company Limited, together with its subsidiaries, engages in the agriculture business in Thailand. The company is involved in plantation, extraction, processing, distribution, import, and export hemps and cannabis, as well as provides properties renting services. The company was formerly known as Sea Horse Public Company Limited and changed its name to Eternal Energy Public Company Limited in October 2009. Eternal Energy Public Company Limited was incorporated in 1987 is headquartered in Bangkok, Thailand.
